Name: Robert Bradway
Background: Has held executive roles at biotech firm Amgen since 2007.

Name: David Calhoun
Occupation: President and CEO of Boeing (since December)
Background: Formerly served in executive roles at The Blackstone Group, Nielsen and General Electric.

Name: Arthur Collins Jr.
Occupation: Senior adviser, Oak Hill Capital Partners
Background: Served in executive leadership of medical device company Medtronic for more than a decade.

Name: Edmund Giambastiani Jr.
Background: A Navy admiral and former vice chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff under President George W. Bush.
other_dir: THL Credit, New York Board of the Oppenheimer Funds

Name: Lynn Good
Occupation: Chair, President and CEO of Duke Energy
Background: A longtime accountant and partner at Arthur Andersen and Deloitte & Touche.

Name: Nikki Haley
Background: A former Republican governor of South Carolina who served as U.N. ambassador under President Donald Trump.

Name: Lawrence Kellner
Background: Former chief executive and chairman of Continental Airlines.

Name: Caroline Kennedy
Background: Former ambassador to Japan under President Barack Obama, former chief of Office of Strategic Partnerships in NYC Department of Education.

Name: Edward Liddy
Occupation: Former Chairman and CEO of Allstate
Background: Served as an interim chairman and CEO of American International Group and a partner at private equity firm Clayton, Dubilier & Rice.

Name: Dennis Muilenburg
Occupation: Former Chairman, president and CEO of Boeing
Background: A Boeing engineer who ascended the company ranks to CEO in 2015; fired in December 2019.

Name: John Richardson
Background: Served as Chief of Naval Operations under Presidents Barack Obama and Donald Trump.

Name: Susan Schwab
Occupation: Professor at University of Maryland and strategic adviser for global law firm Mayer Brown.
Background: Served as trade ambassador under President George W. Bush.

Name: Ronald Williams
Occupation: Chairman and CEO of RW2 Enterprises
Background: Former chairman, president and CEO of Aetna.

Name: Mike Zafirovski
Occupation: Executive adviser for The Blackstone Group, President of The Zaf Group
Background: Held executive roles for GE, Nortel Networks and Motorola.
